Package src.java.searchengine

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    QueryProcessor
    Takes an InvertedIndex and process it to obtain certain results that then stores on a List of Query objects.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    FreqQueryWordsBuilder
    An implementation of SearchEngineBuilder creates a SearchEngine with a FrequencyOfQueryWordsProcessor.
    FrequencyOfQueryWordsProcessor
    An implementation of QueryProcessor that sums the frequency of the query words that appear in a document
    NormalizedProcessor
    An implementation of QueryProcessor uses the dot product between vector to calculate th score for each document
    NormalizedSearchEngineBuilder
    An implementation of SearchEngineBuilder creates a SearchEngine with a NormalizedProcessor.
    SearchEngine
    This class is responsible for loading the queries, process them and saving them into a file.
    SearchEngineBuilder
    This abstract class serves as a starting point for the an implementation of the builder pattern with the purpose of creating an instance of a SearchEngine.
    WordsInDocBuilder
    An implementation of SearchEngineBuilder creates a SearchEngine with a WordsInDocumentProcessor.
    WordsInDocumentProcessor
    An implementation of QueryProcessor that counts the number of the query words that appear in a document
